Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6558 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6558 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-17, affected by CVE-2025-6558
